data.title: Device
paragraphs: The physical Bluetooth device may be guaranteed to have some properties that the UA may not have received.

data.title: Server
paragraphs: BluetoothRemoteGATTServer represents a GATT Server on a remote device.

data.title: Service
paragraphs: BluetoothRemoteGATTService represents a GATT Service, a collection of characteristics and relationships to other services that encapsulate the behavior of part of a device.

data.title: Properties characteristics
paragraphs: BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic represents a GATT Characteristic, which is a basic data element that provides further information about a peripheralâ€™s service.

Each BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic exposes its characteristic properties through a BluetoothCharacteristicProperties object. These properties express what operations are valid on the characteristic.
